en: Sirenade
Lazy Ranger
Apparently this place was hidden away for years without a customer.
Exploring is hard work but sometimes you find a great spot to relax.
Enthusiastic Ranger
They've even got live music! I wonder if they do requests?
Dan Djinn
Arf?
Is... That a Djinn Entonic working as a barkeep?
Huh? A monster is working... as a barkeep?
What?! A monster behind the bar!
Huh? A Djinn Entonic is running the place!
This is most unusual {player}! I've not been to a tavern with monsters behind the counter!
Oh![pause] It's nothing that [wave amp=30 freq=10]unusual[wave]!
I'm a ranger turned barkeep, but I find this monster form is excellent at serving customers!
Ah! You must be here to investigate the [wave amp=30 freq=10]spooky cellar[/wave] as well?
Spooky cellar?
Maybe another time
My apologies. We might not look it but we're quite full right now.
Please do stop by another time.
Indeed. To put it bluntly, our cook was most disappointed to find out our cellar vanished.
I'd not heard of something like that happening before...
Huh. What? How does a cellar go missing?
This sounds suspicious {player}!
There's always something new on this island huh?
A most curious tale...
Fortunately, it came back! Fully stocked with a collection of delicious ingredients too...
Unfortunately, eating the food seems to send you [wave amp=30 freq=10]somewhere else[/wave]...
The last ranger to explore has started calling it the False Wirral, but they've never made it to end...
What can I do for you today?
What does this False Wirral look like?
Patrons always start out somewhere that looks a lot like this fine establishment!
The further in you travel, the more things look like other areas of New Wirral.
Nobody has reached the end yet though. Perhaps you could be the first!
Can we come back?
Oh![pause] How could I forget such a detail!
Every ranger we've sent in so far eventually lost a battle and woke up here again.
Interestingly, they said they saw other rangers in there that they didn't recognise...
Ask about the bar
This bar is the Djinnterlude. Why not relax and leave the world at the door?
We have delightful music, a delicious menu, and a disappearing cellar...
I would recommend the house special.\nIt is seasoned with ingredients from beyond, ideal for equally seasoned explorers.
Order the house special
Fine choice. I can't wait to hear what you find!
Leave
Farewell! Do stop by again.
An Archangel![pause] In our cellar!?
That would have been quite the draw for business! Though that whole sculpting thing sounds a bit troubling...
Things did seem to return to normal for a while, but unfortunately before you woke up the strangeness started again...
The Archangel came back![pause] To our cellar!?
That will be quite the draw for business! Though that whole fake reality thing is a bit worrying...
It does seem though that this False Wirral is still very much doing its thing...
It looks like you made another successful trip!
Your stories have been great to retell for business! Though the whole returning again and again things is a bit concerning...
The good news is, the cellar is still restocking itself and at least we have more answers now!
Ah, so you ran into a tough opponent too...
Hmm, that place does seem quite dangerous...
Unfortunate. I take it you will be ordering again though...
Oh, you can use the stations to get out?
Those stations are pretty useful. If only they did return trips...
We found some new items on the shelves after you returned. I think these belong to you...
Much like last time, we had some new items arrive. Here's what we found...
Oh! Here's the items you bought back..
Farewell! Do stop by again.
Supply Merchant
Looking for supplies?
Rare Supply Merchant
I found some rare stuff! Want to trade?
Tape Collector
Need some tapes?
Sticker Enthusiast
Take a look at these stickers I found!
Lazy Sticker Collector
These stickers just work on their own! Want to buy any?
See you later!
Oh. {player}. What can I do for you?
Where are we?
Indeed! An excellent question.\nYou are still very much in the bounds of New Wirral.
However, at this moment you are on something closer to a reflection of the island, rather than the island itself.
Can we leave?
Of course! The Mer-Line's gracious service extends to ephemeral places such as this.
You are just in time for the last train from this particular station. Would you like to board?
Excellent. The train to Falldown Mall shall depart shortly.
Nothing
Very well!
Platform B?
The entity... at Platform B is quite the elusive type. I'm told it has quite the eye for detail.
You would be wise to be wary of its fabrications, human.
Welcome back, {player}. How can I help?
Where did the station go?
Your victory over the host of this space has lead to a local dimensional collapse.
Count yourselves fortunate. The infinite Mer-Line is committed to operating a reliable service, Long may their trains run on time!
You shall find the last train from this station departing shortly from the tunnel ahead.
What happens now?
It is unclear. The avatar you were victorious over has disappeared for now, at least.
You shall find the last train from this station departing shortly from the tunnel ahead.
As mortal, flesh based entities, lingering here would not be a preferable choice.
Leave
A ticket machine is locking the entrance.
Use the show ticket?
Comedjinn
I heard some Djinnentonics tried to create the largest mind meld the other day...
...they said they were going to start the Djinnternet.
No respect.\nI don't get no respect...
I went to ranger HQ last week in my finest outfit and they said 'You want the other shipwreck!'
I even tried to be an apprentice with Captain Lodestein last summer.[pause]\nHe sent me to ranger HQ to get a 'long wait'.
Well, They still haven't got back to me![pause]\nNo respect at all.
Phew...
Tough crowd...
Rowdy Binvader
Collection day was funnier.
I'm not a green bin.\nI don't take recycled material.
The only tip I'm leaving is a fly tip.
I was told this act was a ticket seller.\nI want to sell my ticket.
I'd rather sit outside on a windy day than watch this act again.
I laughed more at the holiday collection schedule.
I'd rather watch a show about a blue phone box.
We traveled all this way, and this is the only act that's on?
Allie
Welcome to the Allie Inn.\nSorry about the crowd - They've been heckling all day.
What can I do for you?
Rowdy customers?
Order something
Leave
The Binvaders?\nThey spend well but they always heckle our talent...
Perhaps you could ask them to leave? I can give you some things previous rangers left behind.
Offer to take out the trash?
We haven't finished our heckling yet!
We will make you regret this!
Great work dealing with that rowdy bunch.\nTake this, it's on the house...
Sure - here's the menu!
Thank you for stopping by.
Fading Ranger
Fading Ranger
Echos from outside
The sigil...\nIt...
I left this place...\nWhy am I still...
This place goes in cycles...
So... loud...
I can't recall the outside...
The exit... has gone...
I... repeat... over...

ANOTHER IMPERFECT BEING

THIS SPACE STILL LACKS DEPTH...

I SHALL MAKE ITS ANGLES PERFECT
SUCH A LOWLY VESSEL IS NOT FIT FOR ROYALTY\n\nLEAVING US IN SUCH A BIND SHALL NOT GO UNANSWERED
YOU MEAT THINGS STILL DREAM OF DEATH. IS THAT WHAT BOUGHT YOU BACK TO US?
MORE TOYS!\n\nA WORLD OF PUPPETS FOR MY COLLECTION!

THIS VESSEL DOES NOT KNOW OUR NATURE

IGNORANCE IS A GIFT

I SHALL ENLIGHTEN YOU TO A DREAM BEYOND TRUTH AND LIES
THIS UNSTABLE ONE IS GREATER THAN THE SUM OF ITS PARTS {player.to_upper}
A VAST EMPTINESS LIVES WITHIN THIS VESSEL\n\nA FEAST FIT FOR A KING
WHAT DEVOTION THIS VESSEL HAS\n\nHAVE YOU COME TO PAY TRIBUTE TO ME?
THIS LAND FIT FOR REDEVELOPMENT\n\nA SPACE FOR A PALACE TO YOUR KIND'S CONSUMPTION
WHAT AN EXCITING MYSTERY! I WONDER WHAT PLAYWRITE THIS ONE IS FROM?\n\nPERHAPS OUR STAGE NEEDS A FITTING ENCORE
ROLL UP, ROLL UP!\n\nANOTHER WORLD OF CREATION AWAITS US!
I hope defeating the ranger has stopped what was happening here. I don't trust that sticker though {player}.
We did it, mate! I think this ranger will be ok now.
We've put a stop to another evil plan {player}!\nI wonder what that sticker is...
I thought we'd already got the best of the Archangels?\nDid that sticker have something to do with this?
It appears we've foiled the machinations of an archangel once again.
Barkley lets out a short, hopeful bark.
Ranger Explorer
Moody Ranger
Smart Ranger
Crafty Ranger
Grumpy Ranger
Sneaky Ranger
Ranger Archeologist
Daring Ranger
Ranger Hunter
Ranger Scout
Ranger Navigator
Ranger Sidekick
Ranger Trainee
Ranger Recruit
Ranger Support
Curious Ranger
Bumbling Ranger
Ranger Gatherer
Ranger Strategist
Cheerful Ranger
You're exploring too? I won't lose!
Shh... they'll hear you...\nthey only move when you do...
Look at this awesome tape I found!
There's some sweet bootlegs around here. Did you find any?
I've not seen you before, are you a new recruit?
What's with these sigil stickers?
I wonder if there is an end to this place?
It's dangerous down here. Are you ready for what's ahead?
I saw a rowdy group of bins rolling through the mall before...
No! I wont share any of the treasure!
I'm going to give that Djinn a piece of my mind when I get back. I just wanted some dinner.
I almost got eaten by a treasure chest! No way am I losing to you!
Getting tired? I'll make this quick...
So is this where the all the stock in the mall came from?
I just learned an kick-ass move. Let me show you.
I'm the undefeated guardian of this exit. I hope you're ready.
I heard there's something really dangerous at the end of all this.\nIf you can beat me, i'll let you through.
I'm just about done here - let's get this over with.
I've been training out here for weeks...
Nope. Your name's not down buddy. Jog on.
Feelin' lucky?\n This doorway ain't big enough for the both of us.
Give me everything you got!
Did you see that shifty Landkeeper in the caves?
This floor exit's mine!
You look like a good fighter, and I'm looking for a challenge!
I thought I saw a cat sneaking around...
An explorer and a fighter? Nothing's gonna hold you back.
Too loud... to powerful...
I'll have more awesome tapes next time!
Must... collect... more...
You've got skills! You should try to be a captain!
I heard there is one that lets you bring tapes out of here.\nI've never seen it though...
If you find it, tell me!
I guess it was me who wasn't ready enough
Put out with the garbage...
Ok! I guess there is enough to go around!
Looks like I'm going back sooner than expected...
I guess you're even more dangerous, huh?
See?\nYou can thank me later...
Dangit, I'm out of business
Sweet move! Where did you learn that?
You may pass.
Hey, maybe you can manage it
Humbled again.
I'll train for a few more...
Jog on... to the next floor!
Quick on the draw, I like that.
Whoa!\nToo much too handle!
I shouldn't have given away my best move...
But you're pretty tough, you can use it I guess...
I'll get you next time!
I guess we've scared it off now.
It's Creator Felix's quiet friend!
Creator!
Kuneko? What are you doing here?
I am on a truly epic quest!
Or was...[pause]\nt-though I can't use a cassette player...
But you do!\nMaybe our meeting was destined by fate itself!
Help Kuneko with her quest?
Yay! The legends say I must take this mystical sticker across the land...
I must search far and wide for a blessing of the shrine, and seek victory in combat!
Only then shall I learn a secret technique and unlock the power that's inside!
I guess your right... I must prove my strength by myself!
I couldn't figure it all out, but I know you will need to put the sticker on a tape!
Hmm... Victory in combat... Blessing of a shrine...
Oh! I've seen some of those shrines around here. Maybe there is one deeper in...
I figured it out! Have you tried winning a battle with the sticker equipped?
You helped me again!
You can always count me in.
With our powers combined we have discovered the lost technique!
Except...[pause] I still need to learn it...
M-maybe we could practice together on this Island I found?[pause]\nIf I master it maybe I can teach you!
Follow Kuneko to her Training Island?
Theres secret entrance... Follow me!
I-if you change your mind... I'll be here!
Welcome Creator Felix's friends[pause] to the ultimate island of training!
Welcome Creator Felix[pause] to the ultimate island of training!
My instincts say that if we fight here with fire in our hearts...\nWe can reach our [shake rate=30 level=10]true potential[/shake]!
She's really getting into this isn't she?
Train with Kuneko?
I'll show you how much stronger I am now!
Aww
That was fun![pause] But I'm not done yet![pause] I was only using an adequately small percentage of my power!
By the light of the moon that is shining above...[pause]somewhere in the world!
I shall use my [shake rate=30 level=10]true potential[/shake] for real this time!
Y'know, I think we've really fired her up this time.
Lets give it our all!
Aww
I mastered the skill! But I still need to learn more to beat you...
It was an honor training with you, friends of Creator Felix!
Creator Felix, it was an honor battling you again!
Good luck exploring!
Former Landkeeper
[wave amp=30 freq=5]Hello Investors.\n[pause]I have an excellent business opportunity. Care to talk?[/wave]
Arf?
The Landkeepers! What are they up to now?
Ugh. The Landkeepers are here too...
What!?[pause] Didn't we kick these guy's ass already?
Hey, these guys are back. I wonder what villainy they've been up to here...
Hmm.[pause] Its those land merchants again. What selfish ruse might they have planned this time?
[wave amp=30 freq=5]We're not in the land business anymore. We've found something more...[pause]lucrative...[/wave]
[wave amp=30 freq=5]We're interested in [b]stickers[/b].[pause]\nIn Intellectual property.[/wave]
[wave amp=30 freq=5]For the low price of one uncommon sticker...[pause]I can put you in touch with our sales executives...[/wave]
Pay an [color=#225d31]uncommon[/color] sticker, of the Landkeeper's choosing?
Invest a sticker
Reject the offer
[wave amp=30 freq=5]{sticker} will make an excellent edition to our portfolio.[pause]\nI'll open the gate to our offices now...[/wave]
[wave amp=30 freq=5]You don't have the type of stickers we're after...[/wave]
[wave amp=30 freq=5]Perhaps... another time then...[/wave]
We have granted you a non-transferrable license to use the gate to our premises. We look forward to future business transactions...
Landkeeper Investor
Landkeeper Trader
Invest a [color=#35379d]rare[/color] sticker, of the Landkeeper's choosing?
Invest a sticker
Fight the Landkeeper
Leave
[wave amp=30 freq=5]You look like some shrewd investors.[pause]\nWelcome to our marketplace of ideas.[/wave]
[wave amp=30 freq=5]A wise trade here could pay dividends for your journey...[/wave]
[wave amp=30 freq=5]We'll take {sticker}.\nA pleasure doing business with you.[/wave]
[wave amp=30 freq=5]Your stickers lack the rarity and product market fit we desire.[/wave]
[wave amp=30 freq=5]A hostile takeover?\n[pause]A brave thought...[pause] but the board declines.[/wave]
[wave amp=30 freq=5]Our office hours are on the wall if you change your mind....[/wave]
[wave amp=30 freq=5]This market is closed for today, visitor.[/wave]
[wave amp=30 freq=5]That is a fine sticker portfolio...[pause]\nCould we interest you in an assignment of ownership?[/wave]
[wave amp=30 freq=5]Our remuneration will be quite...[pause]amicable...[/wave]
[wave amp=30 freq=5]Thank you visitor for {sticker}.[pause]\nDo stop by again.[/wave]
[wave amp=30 freq=5]Your stickers do not synergize with our business strategy.[/wave]
[wave amp=30 freq=5]We have quite the portfolio too, visitor.\n[pause]But very well...[/wave]
[wave amp=30 freq=5]Unfortunate. Let us know if you change your mind....[/wave]
[wave amp=30 freq=5]Our terms and conditions limit us to one trade per day, visitor.[/wave]
[wave amp=30 freq=5]Have you seen a Djinn Entonic recently? I was looking to invest in the mind meld intellectual property...[/wave]
[wave amp=30 freq=5]Would you like to rent one of our stickers? I can give you a fair payment plan...[/wave]
[wave amp=30 freq=5]Please inform Captain Codey that he should cease and desist his use of the following stickers...[/wave]
[wave amp=30 freq=5]Could I interest you in our subscription services? Terms and conditions apply.[/wave]
[wave amp=30 freq=5]We tried making a digital millennium copycat attack sticker...[/wave]
[wave amp=30 freq=5]We've realized the errors of our ways chasing landownership. Care to listen to our new business proposal?[/wave]
[wave amp=30 freq=5]I was reading about antitrust litigation. Don't worry. You can trust us with your stickers.[/wave]
[wave amp=30 freq=5]Attempting to use Broadcast with one our stickers will be met with litigation.[/wave]
[wave amp=30 freq=5]Unfortunately, most common stickers are in the public domain already...[/wave]
We might be able to find more cassettes here! Neat!
I wonder if the vinyl is here?
Another empty mall huh?
I guess this makes sense, we did come this way.
Another sprawling monument to commerce
There's apparently loads of unexplored caves on New Wirral. Are we in one?
I uhh.. can't see the bottom of that pit.
I bet there's some tough monsters down here!
Whoa. It's much darker in here.
A cave such as this could harbor a creature of legend...
I wonder if there is another Ranger HQ here.
Alright, a new town to explore!
Time to hit the town!
That sea view makes me wish I'd bought my sketchbook.
The ocean wind lifts the spirits!
If this is like the other stations, I'm not sure we'll like what's at the end of this.
Argh! These stations give me the creeps.
Keep on your toes, these stations are never far away from trouble.
I get the feeling we're reaching the end of this place.
Its one of these old, troubling structures. We would be wise to tread carefully.
It feels like this is the end of whatever this place is...
Those cubes could make some great stage lighting...
Heroes never get an easy quest, do they? But we shall prevail!
This place gives off some big Archangel vibes, don't you think?
This is quite the place we've ended up, isn't it {player}?
I'm getting a bad feeling about that ranger up ahead...
Umm... should the air be shifting like that?
I think we've got a tough fight ahead, {player}...
The air here... it feels like those stations...
Something feels troubling about this place, {player}...
Brilliant! A quick stop is just what we needed.
Doesn't this place remind you of the Gramophone Caf√© a bit too much?
Hey, they've got an act on the stage!
And to think I thought there was only one Inn in New Wirral just the other day.
This is a quaint tavern, isn't it?
I didn't expect another office here of all places...
You know, aside from that big trap door you'd never even know this place was here...
So this is where they've been hiding!
Isn't this office a bit bigger than the others? I hope that doesn't mean they've been more successful.
This is a strangely bleak hideaway, is it not?
This is certainly a change of scenery!
This is a pretty chill spot actually...
C'mon {player}! This is the perfect place for some combat training!
Whoa! She has a whole island! I didn't add this to her backstory...
A training ground! A perfect place to prepare for battle.
Lucid Sculptor
Lost in Makebelieve
An Archangel living in a dream of its own creation. It uses its guests from outside to 'sculpt' its idealized 'False Wirral'.
{player.to_upper}... {partner.to_upper}...[pause]\n\nHAVE THE LANDS OF MY SLUMBER BEEN TO YOUR LIKING?
YOUR KIND COULD LIVE THE FANTASIES YOU INVENT\n\nYET YOU FIGHT A WORLD BEYOND YOUR CONTROL
YOUR KIND DESIRES WHAT YOU CANNOT LIVE\n\nYOU FIGHT EACH OTHER FOR THE BRUSH TO A CANVAS YOU DO NOT OWN
YOUR KIND SEEKS HAPPINESS IN PLACES YOU INVENT\n\nYET YOU LONG TO ESCAPE EVEN THOSE BEFORE TOO LONG
MY REALITY BEYOND SLEEP...\n\nIT CAN GRANT YOU THE IMPOSSIBLE WORLDS YOUR HEART SEEKS
Grr!
No! We're trying to get everybody home! We're not getting stuck somewhere else!
We don't plan on sticking around New Wirral or False Wirral or wherever this is buddy.
No deal! We won't just give up on getting home!
Uh, No. Thanks.
I'm afraid we'll have to decline.
I SHALL BE TAKING YOUR EXPERIENCES INTO THIS DREAM\n\nYOUR REPLICAS WILL MAKE A FINE MARBLE TO SCULPT
